title: Brush Ridge
text: Brush Ridge is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in the <a href="Catskill%20Mountains">Catskill Mountains</a> of <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a> northeast of <a href="Fleischmanns%2C%20New%20York">Fleischmanns</a>. <a href="Monka%20Hill">Monka Hill</a> is located southeast and <a href="Belle%20Ayr%20Mountain">Belle Ayr Mountain</a> is located south of Brush Ridge.
